extendedInfo.description: A painting app focusing on natural brusheffects and smooth, pleasant workflow.  The key unique features:	-- Unique natural media brushes that simulate proper bristles and blending, the way your workstation software does.	-- Innovative and intuitive workflow that allows you to perform common actions without breaking your flow to click on buttons.	-- Brilliant ideas such as the Color Sweep, a configurable swatch of color that you can set up and then access with a simple gesture while drawing.       -- Paid version gets you a brush editor with which you can create WELL NIGH ANY BRUSH!       -- Free version is fully functional -- no sneaky disabling of the export feature or anything of that sort.

reviews.title: Some issues..
reviews.comment: has potential but a few issues. For one cant seem to import into layers (?) and the help doesnt explain it very well. and an issue with the update is that now the \'undo\' seems to of broken :(
reviews.author: Jeania C

reviews.title: Very nice controls, yet simple to use
reviews.comment: As an artist i Like this for freehand portraits on my gnote 2. Elegantly simple yet Nice control over brush styles, sizes etc.
reviews.author: M Kneeland

reviews.title: Has potential!
reviews.comment: Love the brushes and blending of paint effects. UI it\'s also way way better than sketch book mobile, but the app has major problems with zooming and panning making it almost unusable, I even tried one finger zooming and it still won\'t pan when zoomed in. I\'m willing to buy this app if this is fixed.
reviews.author: Hilton Tiam-Lee

reviews.title: S Pen support please
reviews.comment: For the remaining 5th star. Otherwise a function rich, versatile app.  Using the \"full\" version.
reviews.author: Gergo Viczian

reviews.title: Not just another paint app!
reviews.comment: The ways the brushes can be edited is mind boggling.  I only use it on my phone right now and it\'s great. With an s-Pen and a tablet it would be amazing!
reviews.author: K kmodek

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comment: Tried the app through app gratis. Didn\'t hold out alot of hope due to the small file size and the fact that it\'s a paint program on a phone. Boy was i wrong...an absolutely fantastic app. A slew of options and just a pleasure to use!
reviews.author: Nick Cox

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Please add spen support for galaxy note devices,where only the pen input is the only one registred meaning you can get more accurate drawings and pan easily with fingers, i would buy it instantly!
reviews.author: Hossam Abubakr

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very impressed with how great this app works on my HTC One and my Galaxy Note 2.
reviews.author: Darryl Doak

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Drew many sketch..Good
reviews.author: King H

reviews.comment: Nice, but I\'m not creative
reviews.author: Brian DeWitt

reviews.title: Lovely app
reviews.comment: Help doesn\'t work and so far as I can tell, the only way to get an image from it is to export to drop box and then download it from there. Shame because it is a good app but getting your picture out should not be so hard. Otherwise four stars.
reviews.author: Steve Parkin

reviews.title: HOW PECULIAR....
reviews.comment: How odd that some features of this app look exactly like those of the app \"Infinite Painter\" except NOT AS POLISHED. Seems like some college kid was trying to make a buck by attempting to steal and recreate another developer\'s work. If you like this app, I suggest you check out Infinite Painter - it has even more features and is more polished. Please do not support this thief.
reviews.author: Chelsea Thouvenot

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: It\'s simple enough for a beginner like me to understand, yet still has a lot of function. It\'s similar to infinite painter, but easier to grasp.
reviews.author: Stephen Christensen

reviews.title: What i wish...
reviews.comment: First things first,  it\'s pretty obvious that the interface is a direct clone of infinite painter. BUT as a consumer and an amatuer artist i want my painting/drawing app to actually work. Clone this may be, it does however work much better than infinite painter. I don\'t experience crashes and there\'s hardly any brush lag.   Why not work things out and combine the effort? Both app fills the short comings of the other.
reviews.author: Andrei Lanuza

reviews.title: A Pathetic Rip-Off Artist!  Get Infinite Painter!
reviews.comment: This charlatan must incredibly uncreative!  While this app doesn\'t match it in high quality, creativity, being original, having polish, being original, working well at all, being original, it still has ripped off the brush, color and main menus from the every brilliant Infinite Painter and Infinite Design.  Sean Brakefield\'s app\'s that you blatantly infringed upon, have been around forever and just keep getting better by each update, while this poorly constructed clone just popped up recently.  It\'s incredibly apparent that this charlatan or developer if you so choose, has absolutely downloaded and used Sean\'s app\'s Infinite Painter and Infinite Design.  And this developer must have said to himself \"Gee, I\'m horribly unoriginal, untalented, and uncreative, I know! I\'ll design a drawing app, and I\'ll copy everything out of that drawing app, Infinite Painter!  Yeah, it\'s infringing upon Sean\'s intellectual property, but, well I don\'t have morals or scruples or ethics, so what the heck, I just want to make a quick buck while stealing someone else\'s ideas and hard work!\"  The only \"Serious\" thing about this app, is the Serious scumbaggery of ripping off another developers idea\'s!
reviews.author: Gordon Alf Shumway

reviews.title: This is fantastic!:)
reviews.comment: Who cares if they copied infinite painter? It works way better!
reviews.author: Dianasauras Recks

reviews.title: Has Promise...
reviews.comment: This app offers some nice brushes and features, but the interface is very similar to my app, Infinite Painter, and needs some polish. Currently working with the developer on this issue.
reviews.author: Sean Brakefield

reviews.title: Remarkable
reviews.comment: For a first release, this app is remarkably complete and remarkably competent. A powerful brush engine coupled with a real attention to workflow makes it pleasurable and productive to use, creating images that look as if they\'ve been created with a brush not a stylus.
reviews.author: Giles Broxis

reviews.title: Superlative
reviews.comment: Very easy to work with, and great paint-like brushes.  No unnecessary complexity, yet everything you need to create artwork on the go.  Works best with Note devices.  One of the best paint programs on Android so far.  Having said that, I am the author so I\'m not really disinterested.
reviews.author: Benjamin Peterson

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: You can\'t even share your work because it won\'t save to SD card or phone... worthless app.
reviews.author: Gary Griggs
